archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.3a: a) includes the conditions for use of employee-owned devices (e.g. user obligations, waiver of liability and employer rights to inspect, remote audit and remote wipe)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
